an9.52:1.2: Kittāvatā nu kho, āvuso, khemaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā”ti?
an9.52:2.1: “Idhāvuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.52:2.2: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, khemaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā pariyāyena …pe….
an9.52:3.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
an9.52:3.2: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, khemaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā nippariyāyenā”ti.
